name: QuestEvent
description: QuestEvent is a Adventure RPG. You will have a world to explore, practice different Skills and doing Quests. The graphics of the game are Pokémon likely. But the Content is based on several huge MMORPG's.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Any processor. At least 1.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
